titleStmt.title: A collection of chronical diseases viz. the colick, the bilious colick, hysterick diseases, the gout, and the bloody urine from the stone in the kidnies / by J. Pechey ...
titleStmt.author: Pechey, John, 1655-1716.
Rivière, Lazare, 1589-1655.
Sydenham, Thomas, 1624-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R., and are to be sold by Henry Bonwicke ...,

notesStmt.note: "The first chapter is taken from Riverius, the other from the worthy Dr. Sydenham's works" Cf. Advertisement.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
